item.title: Sean Penn Joins Dardenne Brothers, Walter Salles as Executive Producer on Brazil’s ‘Manas’
item.description: “I felt as if I had to put my skin back on after watching it,” says the two-time Oscar winner about the film by Marianna Brennand.
